name: save-session-lambda
description: Lambda function to save user sessions with geolocation

scripts.zip:win: npm run clean:win && powershell -Command "$files = Get-ChildItem -Path . -Exclude '*.git*',  '*.md', '*.txt', '.DS_Store', '*.log'; Compress-Archive -Path $files -DestinationPath .\save-session-lambda.zip -Force"
